                                                                                      String entityId)
Description copied from interface: ExternalCallDao
Finds an existing external call for the specified operation and entityId.

Specified by:
getExternalCall in interface ExternalCallDao
Parameters:
operationName - the operation name (uri) to find the call for

Returns:

lockExternalCall

@Transactional(propagation=MANDATORY)
public void lockExternalCall(ExternalCall extCall)
                      throws javax.persistence.PersistenceException
Description copied from interface: ExternalCallDao
Updates the specified attached external call entity to start processing a new external call (set state to PROCESSING).

Specified by:
lockExternalCall in interface ExternalCallDao
Parameters:
extCall - the external call that is attached to local EntityManager (e.g., acquired via ExternalCallDao.getExternalCall(String, String) in the same transaction)
Throws:
javax.persistence.PersistenceException - e.g., if the lock fails

Description copied from interface: ExternalCallDao
Finds ONE confirmation in state ExternalCallStateEnum.FAILED.

Specified by:
findConfirmation in interface ExternalCallDao
Parameters:
interval - Interval (in seconds) between two tries of failed confirmations.
Returns:

lockConfirmation

public ExternalCall lockConfirmation(ExternalCall extCall)
Description copied from interface: ExternalCallDao
Updates confirmation (set state to PROCESSING) - gets lock for this confirmation.

Specified by:
lockConfirmation in interface ExternalCallDao
Parameters:
extCall - the external call
Returns:
the locked external call, if lock is successful; throws an exception, if the lock failed
